The band formed in 1976, and early shows saw them supporting The Stranglers, Iggy Pop and The Sex Pistols at the infamous 100 Club Festival Of Punk. After several albums and line-up changes, the original line-up reformed in 1982 and signed for Cherry Red label Anagram Records. Although the line-up and labels have changed over the years, the attitude and dedication that the Vibrators bring to their craft has never waned. The current line-up of the band has just completed yet another world tour playing to their ever loyal fanbase.
